UPSTREAM_ENDPOINT.description: The S3-compatible endpoint URL to proxy (e.g., `https://s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com` or `https://<account-id>.r2.cloudflarestorage.com`)

UPSTREAM_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Access Key ID for authenticating with your upstream S3-compatible storage

UPSTREAM_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Secret Access Key for authenticating with your upstream S3-compatible storage

CLIENT_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: Access Key ID that clients will use to authenticate with this proxy. Generate a secure random value using `openssl rand -hex 20`

CLIENT_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: Secret Access Key that clients will use to authenticate with this proxy. Generate a secure random value using `openssl rand -hex 32`
